math.alttext: \begin{array}[]{r@{\qquad}rcl@{\qquad\mbox{2 flavor:~}}l@{\qquad\mbox{3 flavor% :~}}l }\mbox{Exotic:}\qquad&J_{\rm E}&=&D-C\hfil\qquad\mbox{2 flavor:~{}}&I=2% \hfil\qquad\mbox{3 flavor:~{}}&{\bf 27}\\ \mbox{Non-exotic:}\qquad&J_{\rm N}&=&D+\frac{1}{2}C\hfil\qquad\mbox{2 flavor:~% {}}&I=0\hfil\qquad\mbox{3 flavor:~{}}&{\bf 1},{\bf 8}\end{array}
